name: SisuID
description: Free open source digital authentication for eSocieties
SDGevidence: SisuID aims to provide affordable, inclusive and transparent digital trust infrastructure for the first step towards a digital society, digital identity and authentication.

organizations.name: SisuID Consortium (Note: the solution source code is to be released as open source. Currently part of the backend is published under Linux Foundation with project name Janssen)
